content: BOSTON  April 7 Adobe Systems Inc  issued an emergency update on Thursday to its widely used Flash software for Internet browsers after researchers discovered a security flaw that was being exploited to deliver ransomware to Windows PCs.
name: Proofpoint Inc
title: Adobe issues emergency update to Flash after ransomware attacks
